title: kale_plot_clearance_after_harvest
summary: Complete removal of kale plants from vegetable plot.
description: This data unit documents the complete removal of kale plants from the vegetable plot following harvest. The area was cleared to prepare for planning and planting of a different vegetable crop. This action directly references the prior harvest recorded in Data Unit 00334.

external_reference.note: Recorded as direct field action without inference.
